body: Nishant, [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/f-5dhOEsZkszZ6DGHEBWSqZTPnxKGo18cGQ3Agr14-234LA-etdvrbVTVqKVBDnEsJX8hQZJ99P5MflS2LXiIxzRnxHj7o2i/Capture.JPG) The error originated from the geometry. The breps had to be in perfect alignment with no gaps in between. I fixed that and that fixed everything. Please find the file attached. -Devang
